mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EX_CART (CART_ID, USER_ID, MGNUM, AMOUNT) VALUES (SEQ_CART.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{mgNum}, #{amount})
mapper.select: SELECT C.CART_ID AS cartId, C.USER_ID AS userId, P.MGNUM AS mgNum, M.MNAME AS userName, P.MGNAME AS productName, C.AMOUNT, P.MGPRICE AS productPrice, (MGPRICE * AMOUNT) MONEY FROM MSM_MEMBER M, EX_GOODS P, EX_CART C WHERE M.MID = C.USER_ID AND P.MGNUM = C.mgNum AND C.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY C.CART_ID
